labels.note: This is a list of notification optons. Copy and paste this code to insert the option values to your template.

labels.blank-note: Leave this field blank to use your default value
labels.subject: Subject
labels.note-text: This template has a predefined source. Once you save your notification, this version will replace the predefined one. You can restore the original template using the appropriate button.

notifications-journal.title: Notification activity feed
notifications-journal.subtitle: This section contains the list of all notifications recorded in the system

notifications-list.title: Notification list
notifications-list.subtitle: This section contains the list of all notifications registered in the system

descriptions.number: Phone number that will get the text message (SMS) notification

placeholders.name: Please give this filter a name

unknown-kind.title: Error

notification-details-save.title: Save changes
notification-details-save.message: The notification template has been modified. Do you want to save changes?

notification-template-delete.title: Confirm Delete
notification-template-delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete the selected templates?

notification-template-delete-notificatio.title: Unable to delete template
notification-template-delete-notificatio.message: You cannot delete default or predefined templates. Please deselect such templates and try again.

notification-template-reset-confirmation.title: Confirm Reset Template
notification-template-reset-confirmation.warning: WARNING: This change is permanent and cannot be undone. Applying this change may result in a data loss.
notification-template-reset-confirmation.message: {{count}} template(s) for the following languages will be deleted:

RegistrationEmailNotification.description: The customer will get an email notification once they have registered

ResetPasswordEmailNotification.description: The customer will get an email notification upon a reset password request

TwoFactorEmailNotification.description: This notification contains a security token for two factor authentication

TwoFactorSmsNotification.description: This notification contains a security token for two factor authentication

ConfirmationEmailNotification.description: This email notification confirms the newly registered user's email

ChangePhoneNumberSmsNotification.description: The customer will get a text message once their phone number has been changed

ResetPasswordSmsNotification.description: The customer will get a text message when their password has been reset

RegistrationInvitationEmailNotification.description: The customer will get an email notification once they receive an invite to sign up

RemindUserNameEmailNotification.description: The customer will get an email notification after they click Forgot My Username
